mapper.select: select id, state_id, agent_id, agent_name, start_time, end_time, media_type, reason_start_time, reason_end_time, state, reason, duration, head_clip_duration, trail_clip_duration, create_time, update_time from t_agent_state_detail where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_agent_state_detail(state_id, agent_id, agent_name, start_time, end_time, media_type, reason_start_time, reason_end_time, state, reason, duration, head_clip_duration, trail_clip_duration, create_time, update_time) values (#{stateId}, #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{mediaType}, #{reasonStartTime}, #{reasonEndTime}, #{state}, #{reason}, #{duration}, #{headClipDuration}, #{trailClipDuration}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_agent_state_detail(state_id, agent_id, agent_name, start_time, end_time, media_type, reason_start_time, reason_end_time, state, reason, duration, head_clip_duration, trail_clip_duration, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.stateId}, #{entity.agentId}, #{entity.agentName}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.mediaType}, #{entity.reasonStartTime}, #{entity.reasonEndTime}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.reason}, #{entity.duration}, #{entity.headClipDuration}, #{entity.trailClipDuration}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into t_agent_state_detail(state_id, agent_id, agent_name, start_time, end_time, media_type, reason_start_time, reason_end_time, state, reason, duration, head_clip_duration, trail_clip_duration, create_time, update_time) values

on duplicate key update state_id = values(state_id), agent_id = values(agent_id), agent_name = values(agent_name), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), media_type = values(media_type), reason_start_time = values(reason_start_time), reason_end_time = values(reason_end_time), state = values(state), reason = values(reason), duration = values(duration), head_clip_duration = values(head_clip_duration), trail_clip_duration = values(trail_clip_duration), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update t_agent_state_detail
state_id = #{stateId},
agent_id = #{agentId},
agent_name = #{agentName},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
media_type = #{mediaType},
reason_start_time = #{reasonStartTime},

where id = #{id}
